name: A Templar's Soul
description:
My submission for the GE Jam #3, is currently under development, check this page for more updates, let me know what you think this is my first game.

identifying himself with a Templar knight who must pass a test, he can only do so thanks to hard training and his DUALITY.
His soul will help you in difficult moments, but be careful not to stray too far ....

TIP seek the levers with your soul to make the platforms move
